name: Fingerolympics
description:
11 legit sports for 1-9 players (or fingers)

Share your highscores on twitter using #FingerOlympics

(no mouse required, on the intro screen just press the numbers 1-9)

[Credits]

game by Ludipe

music by Valo

[Shortcuts]

"M" - return to menu (indicated in the game)

"R" - restart current minigame (indicated in the game)

"F" - toggle fullscreen

"X" - toggle all audio

"Z" - toggle additional sounds (leaves background music and the basic things, just in case you find the others annoying).

[Notes]

Made for "A game by its cover" and "The EGX & Rock Paper Shotgun Game Jam".

I used this cartridge by Michael Shillingburg as inspiration.

You can play alone or have up to 8 friends help you control the characters. Try to beat your highscores. Tweet them and challenge others.

I've tested the game many times, but bugs might still appear. Physics are hard.

I did not test mac and linux builds at all.
